html:

      5.5

      i think i was just born that way

      that's easy, just take both sides of every issue, at the same time. enjoy

      telling the secrets, not when they are asked but other times

9.10.21  11:00 am   why is the questions page a .html, but the feeling randy page is a .php? did it feel so randy that it decided to change the file format?

      yes. this is what makes it possible to display different contents each time you load it

9.10.21  10:19 am   Why is music so cool

      to hopefully *influence* you

9.10.21  10:02 am   you respond so interestingly and i think people come here because you make them feel seen and okay, at least that is what brings me back every so often, but then i read a question that asked were you depressed and you said no but then i felt strange because i want to know that your heart hurts too so i can be just the same as you - maybe not a MUSICAL genius but a person who is sad sometimes because it is okay if you are sad sometimes if you are a genius or a person with a nice and loving and creative brain. or in general, but it helps to know you are a genius, whatever that means. anyway, do you get sad? 

      yes. i was considering that to be something different than 'depressed'. the way i see it, there's 2 categories of how to have a bad time. low energy, and high energy. low energy would be 'depressed', and high energy would be 'panic freak out', which tends to be my standard method

9.10.21  9:44 am   do you ever get the feeling 'oh wow, today i might just solve every problem'

      yes

9.10.21  9:38 am   what's your favorite season

      changing the seasons. that's the only thing that does it for me anymore

9.10.21  9:34 am   how can i feel better about myself

      i was gonna say actually be better, but this could be dangerous in case you are already highly good. could overload

9.10.21  2:11 am   I think more songs should really vamp on the chorus at the end. Of course lots of songs end with two choruses, but I feel like some songs could really use more, just repeat the chorus until it doesn't carry the energy anymore. Are people scared to do this or do I just have different tastes?

      this is nature's way of giving you the opportunity of a lifetime

9.10.21  12:26 am   what is your opinion on ants?

      too big

9.9.21  11:15 pm   how do i press the space bar

      just find a spacebar sized object and put it on the space bar

9.9.21  10:46 pm   can you tell me a chord voicing thats as difficult or more to play than:

db db eb f ab eb

in the 2 hand 2 chord method that would be
f-7 no 5 over db8add9

     i'm not familiar with the 2 hand 2 chord method ..... i can't think of a way to do 2 hands 2 chords without making a total mess

     i mean its second best to notation that i have to give a voicing a symbol.


ps. i think its unusual because im not used to hitting two notes with my left thumb (db eb)

      if you're looking for something difficult to play, i'd say almost anything with 25 notes. however, the good or bad news (depending on your objective) is that this is probably gonna sound like crap

      the south star

9.8.21  5:16 am   the thing i want to make cannot exist

      are you sure

9.8.21  2:01 am   every time i hear a producer talk about their process, they always say that they can hear the finished song in their head, and they basically just copy what they hear onto the computer, but but whenever i try to produce a song, my head is empty. i just have zero idea what to do besides add the basics (like drums, bass, chords etc.) and i always end up with a song that is disappointing and then i spiral. do you have the same thing where you can hear the finished song in your head? how do i produce a song that doesnt sound like the most boring thing in the world?

      i'm trying to tell from your description whether you write the song first ..... if you don't, i would suggest trying that. you can use paper or demo recordings to help you remember it, because brand new songs are hard to remember accurately. when i say 'writing' i mean only specifically enough for a person to play and sing it with 1 instrument. no need to plan out everything, just the melody/lyric/chords, an exact tempo, and a full roadmap. that's my method. That doesn't mean i know exactly how the song will sound before i produce it, and it doesn't stop me from feeling empty sometimes at the start of production, but, what's most important is that i do know exactly how the song goes. there's already enough unknowns in the production process details, even after knowing the song
